resources.string: The last name must have at least two letters.
UCR (Alphabet with the letters CH and LL)
the number used will appear here.

◼ What does UCR mean?

UCR stands for the University of Costa Rica. This application has the option of using two alphabets, the current one that everyone uses and the old one which has the letters CH and LL. This last alphabet is the one used in the UCR library system.

◼ What accented letters or characters does the application accept?

Currently the application only accepts Spanish / English alphabet characters and the following accents: Á É Í Ó Ó Ü. In future updates the capacity will be expanded.

◼ How do I submit a suggestion or report a problem with the application?

You can send suggestions or report a problem to the following email: contactfonsecasoftware@gmail.com


This application has no affiliation with the UCR. This application uses the following third-party libraries:

Design and development:
Tyron Fonseca A. – 2020
https://gitlab.com/tfonseca_14

Icon and other UI aspects:
Omar Zamora G.
https://www.instagram.com/crea.cr/

Write the Last Name and Name.
